mapper.insert: insert into bb_coupons (project_id, name, type, discount, min, resume, amount, expired_type, start_date, end_date, duration, limit_wday, limit_room) values (#{staff.projectId}, #{coupon.name}, #{coupon.type}, #{coupon.discount}, #{coupon.min}, #{coupon.resume}, #{coupon.amount}, #{coupon.expiredType,typeHandler=com.ace.dao.handler.EnumHandler}, #{coupon.startDate}, #{coupon.endDate}, #{coupon.duration}, #{coupon.limitWday,typeHandler=com.ace.dao.handler.WeekListTypeHandler}, #{coupon.limitRoom,typeHandler=com.ace.dao.handler.IntegerListHandler})
mapper.select: select * from bb_coupons where id = #{id} limit 1
mapper.update: update bb_coupons set name = #{name}, type = #{type}, discount = #{discount}, min = #{min}, resume = #{resume} where id = #{id}
